details: Conducting research in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Data Mining.
Collaborating with faculty and peers on various research projects.
Publishing findings in academic journals and conferences.
Assisted in teaching undergraduate courses in Computer Science.
Held office hours to support students with coursework and projects.
Graded assignments and exams, providing constructive feedback.
Developed and tested software applications as part of a dynamic team.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving code quality.
Gained hands-on experience with Agile development methodologies.
Assisted in the development of web applications using JavaScript and Python.
Collaborated with senior developers to troubleshoot and resolve software issues.
Contributed to the documentation of software features and user guides.
Worked on front-end and back-end development tasks.
Assisted in the maintenance and updating of existing software applications.
Participated in team meetings and contributed ideas for project improvements.
